import React from 'react'; import AOS from 'aos'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import FadeIn from 'react-fade-in'; import aboutpic from '../assets/other/aboutprofpic.gif'; import pizza from '../assets/other/pizza.gif'; import skincare from '../assets/other/skincare.png'; import denzel from '../assets/other/denzel.jpg'; import applepie from '../assets/other/applepie.png'; import connie from '../assets/other/connie.png'; function AboutPage(props) { AOS.init(); window.scrollTo(0, 0); return (

Hi there! I'm Bryan Ge (he/him).

I’m an undergraduate student at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign studying Information Sciences and graduating December 2023.

How did I get into design?

Since middle school, I've been intrigued by the latest innovations in technology. In college, I discovered the different roles in product and found myself loving design. Since my first project, I have been hooked in the process of understanding users and problems, exploring different design directions, and constantly iterating.

What am I up to?

I’m currently interning at Particle Health, designing the future of healthcare data exchange. This past summer, I interned at Apple as a Product Design Intern on the iCloud Human Interface Team. Next summer, I will be working at Amazon as a UX Design Intern.

🥰 Shoutout to my friends and design moms!

I've received support from my friends and members of the design community. Their guidance and mentorship has been incredibly impactful and I am extremely appreciative of them. Thank you Takara for believing in me from the very start of my design career and Carmen for being an amazing mentor! I've received support from my friends and members of the design community. Their guidance and mentorship has been incredibly impactful and I am extremely appreciative of them. Thank you Takara Satone and Amanda He for believing in me from the start of my design journey and Jake Brokaw for constantly supporting me and giving me feedback on my work.

✏️ Experience

Particle Health — Product Design Intern

October 2022 - Present

Apple — Product Design Intern, iCloud

May - September 2022

Cargill — UX Design Intern

January - April 2022

State Farm — Software Engineer Intern

August - December 2021

Cargill — UX Design Intern

May - August 2021

UIUC — Course Assistant

January - May 2021

📌 Projects

Notion — Campus Leader

September 2022 - Present

Hack4Impact — Product Designer

September 2021 - September 2022

Develop For Good — Product Designer

July - October 2021

Trill Project — Design Intern

February - May 2021

🍵 Here's some more about me!

Outside of school and work, I enjoy baking pumpkin bread, buying candles, and searching for the best sunset views. I've also loved trying new restaurants and boba spots around the bay area this past summer.

I love eating pizza with Riya at Jupiter's. 😋

😇 Here's my favorite skincare products from over the years.

I enjoy going on photoshoots with my friend Connie. Here's a pic from San Diego! ☀️

🎵 This is the playlist I blast while driving!

I hope to have at least 2 corgis when I'm older, but for now here's a picture of my sister's corgi Denzel. 🥰

My sister and I baked this apple pie for Christmas! 🍎

 ); } export default AboutPage;
